ioedata.sensor.service

Interface SensorService


  • public interface SensorService
    This interface provides methods about sensor services, such as sensor registration and getting sensor information of specific devices.
    Author:
    ajou

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSensorExist(org.bson.types.ObjectId sensorSerialNum)
      Check whether the sensor serial number already exists, which should be unique in the database.
      boolean isSensorExist(org.bson.types.ObjectId deviceSerialNum, java.lang.String sensorName)
      Check whether the sensor exists by using device serial number and sensor name.
      org.bson.types.ObjectId registerSensor(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String userWifiSsid, java.lang.String deviceName, java.lang.String sensorType, java.lang.String sensorName)
      Register new sensor to a specific device.
      SensorValue retrieveSensorInfo(int userSerialNum, java.lang.String deviceName, java.lang.String sensorName)
      Get sensor basic information using user serial number, device name and sensor name.
      SensorValue retrieveSensorInfo(org.bson.types.ObjectId deviceSerialNum, java.lang.String sensorName)
      Get sensor basic information using device serial number and sensor name.
      SensorValue retrieveSensorInfo(java.lang.String sensorSerialNum)
      Get sensor basic information using sensor serial number.
      SensorValue retrieveSensorInfo(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String userWifiSsid, java.lang.String deviceName, java.lang.String sensorName)
      Get sensor basic information using user name, user WiFi SSID, device name and sensor name.
      java.util.List<SensorValue> retrieveSensorList(org.bson.types.ObjectId deviceSerialNum)
      Get list of all sensors attached to a device.
      org.bson.types.ObjectId retrieveSensorSerialNumBySensorNameAndDeviceSerialNum(java.lang.String sensorName, org.bson.types.ObjectId deviceSerialNum)
      Get sensor serial number by sensor name and device serial number.

      • isSensorExist

        boolean isSensorExist(org.bson.types.ObjectId sensorSerialNum)
        Check whether the sensor serial number already exists, which should be unique in the database. If sensor serial number already exists, return true; else, return false.
        Parameters:
        sensorSerialNum -
        Returns:

      • isSensorExist

        Check whether the sensor exists by using device serial number and sensor name. If sensor serial number already exists, return true; else, return false.
